item.title: 关税担忧席卷市场，避险情绪升温，黄金走势平稳
item.description: 由于担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战可能导致全球经济下滑，避险需求推动黄金持稳，这表明近几天来黄金的抛售有所暂停。【原文：Gold was steady as fears that US President Donald Trump’s trade war could risk a global economic downturn drove haven demand, signaling a pause in the selloff of the asset in recent days.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税动荡影响，澳大利亚消费者信心指数下滑 6
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税大棒和随之而来的股市暴跌对家庭造成了沉重打击，澳大利亚消费者信心在四月份跌至六个月来的最低点。【原文：Australia’s consumer confidence tumbled in April to a six-month low as President Donald Trump’s barrage of tariffs and the accompanying slump in stock markets hit households hard.】

item.title: 特朗普关税言论冲突令投资者惶恐不安
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对中国额外征收 50%的进口税，而华盛顿和华尔街仍在为如何从其全面的全球关税中获得例外而困惑。【原文：President Donald Trump threatened to slap China with an additional 50% import tax, while Washington and Wall Street remained engulfed in confusion about how to gain exceptions from his sweeping global tariffs.】

item.title: 巴拿马称长江和记欠款 3 亿美元，特许权存疑
item.description: 巴拿马主计长 Anel Flores 表示，长江和记控股有限公司（CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.）旗下的一家当地公司正在出售给贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：A local unit of CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd. that’s being sold to a BlackRock Inc.-led consortium owes $300 million to the government of Panama and didn’t comply with contract renewal procedures, casting doubt over the concession’s legality, Comptroller Anel Flores said.】

item.title: 美国财政部与东盟官员举行闭门关税会谈
item.description: 据伯纳玛（Bernama）报道，美国财政部代表在吉隆坡会见了东南亚高级官员，向他们通报了唐纳德-特朗普总统全面征收全球关税的政策。【原文：A US Department of the Treasury representative met with senior Southeast Asian officials in Kuala Lumpur to apprise them of President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs, Bernama reported.】

item.title: 新日铁股价有望因美国钢铁审查而上涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下令再次审查新日本制铁公司对美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp.【原文：Shares of Nippon Steel Corp. were poised to rise in early Tuesday trade after US President Donald Trump ordered another review of its takeover bid for United States Steel Corp.】

item.title: 投资者称越南股市更接近富时指数评级提升
item.description: 随着富时罗素准备发布指数审查更新，越南多年来对股市升级的等待可能最终在2025年结束，这有可能在美国关税混乱的情况下提振市场情绪。【原文：Vietnam’s years-long wait for an equity market upgrade might finally end in 2025 as FTSE Russell prepares to issue an index review update, potentially boosting market sentiment amid US tariff chaos.】

item.title: 新加坡加紧努力成为亚洲重组中心
item.description: 新加坡的政策制定者正在结束对其破产法修改建议的公众反馈程序，这是为增强新加坡作为亚洲重组中心的吸引力而做出的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Singapore’s policymakers are wrapping up the public feedback process on proposed changes to its insolvency law, part of a broader effort to enhance the city state’s appeal as a hub for restructuring in Asia.】

item.title: 美联储古尔斯比称企业担心关税导致通胀激增
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，商业领袖们非常担心关税会引发大范围的供应中断，并重新造成通胀压力。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said there’s a lot of anxiety among business leaders that tariffs could spark widespread supply disruptions and renew inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 贸易战成为焦点，石油在连续三天下跌后走高
item.description: 全球市场恢复了略微平静的气氛，交易商们在思考美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的最新关税举措，石油在经历了连续三天的暴跌之后稳步走高。【原文：Oil ticked higher after a three-day slump as a slightly calmer tone returned to global markets, with traders pondering the latest tariff moves from US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易战是冲着牛市来的
item.description:
今天的 "Big Take "播客：在交易员努力应对特朗普贸易战带来的不确定性之际，解读全球市场动荡不安的 24 小时。【原文：

On today’s Big Take podcast: Unpacking a volatile 24 hours across global markets as traders grapple with the uncertainty unleashed by Trump’s trade war.

】

item.title: 哥伦比亚通胀率降至三年低点，减息理由更加充分
item.description: 哥伦比亚的通胀率在四个月来首次放缓，这可能会支持中央委员会少数成员的观点，他们上周投票决定重启降息。【原文：Colombian inflation slowed for the first time in four months, potentially bolstering the arguments of the minority on the central board who last week voted to restart interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 报告警告：美欧贸易战可能削弱爱尔兰住房需求
item.description: 房地产网站MyHome.ie称，跨大西洋贸易战引发的经济冲击将削弱爱尔兰的住房需求。【原文：An economic shock caused by a transatlantic trade war would weaken Irish housing demand, property website MyHome.ie said.】

item.title: 衰退风险上升，中国航运业盈利面临 "超预期 "关税打击
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的最新关税措施有可能对全球贸易造成冲击，中国托运人的盈利可能会受到巨大打击。【原文：Chinese shippers may see an outsized hit on earnings as the latest tariffs from US President Donald Trump risk hammering global trade.】

item.title: 借助 Galaxy 智能手机的推动，三星实现利润增长
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）的季度利润超出预期，原因是对 Galaxy S25 智能手机和传统 DRAM 的强劲需求超过了高风险人工智能内存领域利润率的下滑。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.’s quarterly profit beat expectations after strong demand for its Galaxy S25 smartphones and legacy DRAM outpaced slipping margins in the high-stakes AI memory arena.】

item.title: 美股跌幅有限，贸易谈判引发日本股市反弹
item.description: 隔夜美国股市跌幅有限，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普指派官员启动与亚洲国家的双边贸易谈判，日本股市将随之上涨。【原文：Japanese stocks are set to rise after declines in US equities were limited overnight and President Donald Trump assigned officials to kick off bilateral trade talks with the Asian nation.】

item.title: 预见美国经济崩溃的逆向思维者鼓吹世界贸易复苏
item.description: 凯文-穆尔（Kevin Muir）是热门财经时事通讯《宏观旅游者》（The Macro Tourist）背后的投资者，他曾在 12 月份做空高涨的美国科技股。【原文：Kevin Muir, the investor behind popular financial newsletter The Macro Tourist who went short high-flying US tech stocks in December, says it’s time to start getting back into the market.】

item.title: 市场综述：美国期货上涨，亚洲交易员为波动做好准备
item.description: 由于担心唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战会危及全球经济增长，周二亚洲市场的股票、债券和大宗商品大幅波动。美国期货早盘上涨。【原文：Asian markets face heightened volatility on Tuesday after stocks, bonds and commodities were whipsawed by fears that President Donald Trump’s trade war is risking global economic growth. US futures rose in early trading.】

item.title: 人民币贬值呼声高涨，中国人民银行将对人民币出手
item.description: 贸易战的急剧升级把中国带到了一个十字路口，决策者们将决定是应该继续紧紧控制人民币，还是让人民币走软，以应对美国关税带来的一些影响。【原文：A dramatic escalation in the trade war has brought China to a crossroads, with policymakers set to decide if they should retain a tight grip on the yuan or let it weaken to counter some fallout from US tariffs.】

item.title: 全球金融业被特朗普的关税大清洗颠覆，很少有人预见到这一点
item.description: 这并不是全球金融家押注特朗普 2.0 时的初衷。【原文：This is not what global financiers had in mind when they placed their bets on Trump 2.0.】

item.title: 巴菲特 2025 年的财富增长在亿万富豪 "全军覆没 "中脱颖而出
item.description: 在全球最富有的人中，沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）是少有的几位个人财富在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税政策引发全球股市大跌、抹去数万亿美元价值后，今年有所增长的人之一。【原文：Among the world’s richest people, Warren Buffett is among the rare few whose personal fortunes have grown this year after President Donald Trump’s tariffs triggered a selloff that erased trillions of dollars of value from global equities.】

item.title: 关税引发经济衰退担忧，Comex 铜进入熊市
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的扩张性关税激起了人们对经济衰退的担忧，纽约铜交易连续第三天下跌，与 3 月底的近期高点相比，跌幅达到 20%，标志着铜进入熊市。【原文：Copper traded in New York fell for a third straight day, translating to a 20% decline from its recent high in late March and marking an entry into a bear market as US President Donald Trump’s expansive tariffs stoked fears of a recession.】

item.title: Marvell 因以 25 亿美元向英飞凌出售部门的交易而获利
item.description: 芯片制造商 Marvell Technology Inc. 同意以 25 亿美元现金将汽车网络业务出售给英飞凌科技公司（Infineon Technologies AG）后，该公司股价在尾盘交易中上涨。【原文：Marvell Technology Inc. shares gained in late trading after the chipmaker agreed to sell an automotive networking business to Infineon Technologies AG for $2.5 billion in cash.】

item.title: 微软解雇在 50 周年庆典上抗议的员工
item.description: 微软公司解雇了两名扰乱公司 50 周年庆典活动的员工。【原文：Microsoft Corp. dismissed two employees who disrupted an event celebrating the company’s 50th anniversary.】

item.title: 7 分钟内 25 万亿美元的股票大涨令谨慎的投资者大惑不解
item.description: 谣言只持续了大约七分钟。到那时，股票投资者才意识到，唐纳德-特朗普总统暂停关税 90 天的说法并不属实，因此不再疯狂追高股票。【原文：The rumors only lasted about seven minutes. By then, stock investors realized it was not true that President Donald Trump was pausing tariffs for 90 days and, accordingly, stopped frantically bidding stocks higher.】

item.title: 华尔街对加密货币的胃口再次受到新的 Altcoin ETF 的考验
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 Teucrium Investment Advisors LLC 正在推出一款与加密货币 XRP 挂钩的杠杆式交易所交易基金，XRP 是美国监管机构最近结束对瑞波实验室公司（Ripple Labs Inc.【原文：Alternative asset manager Teucrium Investment Advisors LLC is launching a leveraged exchange-traded fund linked to cryptocurrency XRP, the asset at the center of a recently ended probe of Ripple Labs Inc. by US regulators.】

item.title: 特朗普关税与中国碰撞，震撼 115 万亿美元全球经济
item.description:
在中美未来愿景对决激化的不确定性时代，全球投资者正试图对风险重新定价。【原文：

Investors the world over are trying to reprice risk in an age of uncertainty inflamed by dueling US and Chinese visions for the future.

】

item.title: 日本关税神话不会破灭
item.description:
为什么日本的街道上没有美国汽车？这并不神秘，因为它们不够好。【原文：

Why are Japanese streets empty of US cars? It’s no mystery — they're not good enough.

】

item.title: Meta 公司因前雇员索赔问题引起国会审查
item.description: 美国国会议员正在调查 Facebook 一名前雇员的指控，即首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）在公司努力在中国推出社交网络一事上向国会撒谎。【原文：US lawmakers are probing a claim made by a former Facebook employee that Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg lied to Congress about the company’s efforts to launch its social network in China.】

item.title: 苹果客户在关税前抢购 iPhone
item.description: 特朗普政府威胁征收巨额新关税，导致苹果公司股价暴跌，但也带来了短期的好处：顾客纷纷前往零售店购买 iPhone。【原文：The Trump administration’s threat of massive new tariffs has sent Apple Inc.’s share price plummeting, but it also brought a short-term benefit: customers rushing to retail stores to buy iPhones.】
